prodNameC: 拜奈克思退伍軍人肺炎尿液抗原酵素免疫分析試劑
ingredientsDesc:
Microtiter Wells- Each kit contains 96 Microtiter Wells, coated with purified rabbit anti-Legionella pneumophila serogroup 1 IgG.
Wash Concentrate- One (1) vial with 40mL of 0.1 M Phosphate Buffered Saline, detergent and preservative. Dilute the contents to 400 mL with distilled or deionized water for use.
Positive Control Urine- One (1) vial with 2 mL of human urine containing Legionella pneumophila serogroup 1 antigen and preservative.
Negative Control Urine- One (1) vial with 2 mL of normal human urine and preservative. Ready for use.
HRP Conjugate- One (1) vial with 15 mL of purified rabbit anti-Legionella pneumophila serogroup 1 IgG conjugated to horseradish peroxidase (HRP) in a Tris buffer with a protein stabilizer. Contains less than 0.02% thimerosal as a preservative.
Color Developer- One (1) vial with 25 mL of chromogenic substrate solution containing tetramethylbenzidine (TMB) and hydrogen peroxide.
Stop Solution- One (1) vial with 10 mL of 1N H2SO4.
applicantName: 大陳生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台北市大同區塔城街64號3樓
efficacy: 定性檢驗人體尿液中L.pneumophila serogroup 1 antigen。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學用裝置
